title: Take Joy! The Tasha Tudor Christmas Book
description: Lovely oblong hardcover graced by the watercolor illustrations of Tasha Tudor, containing class Christmas stories, songs, & poetry selected & edited by the artist. In 157 pages with illustrations throughout. Orig. published in 1966 by World Publishing, this is a later reprint (with ISBN, so at least the 1970s), but no later date provided. Hardcover book has deep ruby red cloth-covered decorative boards with gilt lettering to spine. Cream-colored DJ with illustration on front.
author: Tasha Tudor
